pkgmetadata.longdescription: # MullvadAPIPython wrapper around Mullvad api## Installation```bashpip install mullvad_api```## QuickStart```python>>> from mullvad_api import MullvadAPI>>> mullvad = MullvadAPI()>>> mullvad.data.keys() # List Mullvad API keys>>> mullvad.data["mullvad_exit_ip"] # Check if Mullvad VPN is activeTrue>>> mullvad.data["ip"] # Check exit ip address'89.46.62.92'```
